name: tskin
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctsk), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))

stmt.origin: mp3an3(wcel(c0, ctsk), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0), wss(cin(c1, c2), c1))
stmt.pretty: mp3an3(c0 ∈ Tarski, c1 ∈ c0, (c1 ⋂ c2)∈ c0, (c1 ⋂ c2)⊆ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctsk), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))
-| wss(cin(c1, c2), c1)
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctsk), wcel(c1, c0), wss(cin(c1, c2), c1)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctsk), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))
-| wss(cin(c1, c2), c1)
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctsk), wcel(c1, c0), wss(cin(c1, c2), c1)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctsk), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctsk), wcel(c1, c0), wss(cin(c1, c2), c1)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctsk), wcel(c1, c0), wss(cin(c1, c2), c1)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctsk), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))

comment: The intersection of two elements of a Tarski class belongs to the class. (Contributed by FL, 30-Dec-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2014.)
